title: Sexing the Cherry
description: This edition has an alt Cover>> Sexing the CherrySet in the 17th century, Sexing the Cherry celebrates the power of the imagination as it playfully juggles with our perception of history and reality. It is a story about love and sex; lies and truths; and twelve dancing princesses who lived happily ever after, but not with their husbands.
author: Jeanette Winterson
